name: The World is Grey
description:
Welcome to the Greymouth Hotel. You will meet 10 different patrons. Each of them will have things to tell you, but be wary - if you leave them they will forget what they've told you! By the end of each day you will have to choose one to kill!

CHOOSE WISELY!

This game was created for the Create Jam Spring 2018, under the theme "Existentialism".
